text: This section describes the Database collection and Database forwarding agents. These agents are for batch workflow configurations. The Database agents are supported for use with the following databases: Oracle PostgreSQL SAP HANA Sybase SQL Server databases Unless specified otherwise, Oracle is the standard and default database. Prerequisites The reader of this information should be familiar with: Structured Query Language (SQL) UDR structure and contents This section contains the following subsections: Database Agents General Information Database Collection Agent Database Forwarding Agent
title: Database Agents - MediationZone Documentation 9.4 - InfoZone
